sense.def:
To fasten something
pomeni nekaj pritrditi ali zapreti z gumbom, trakom ali s čim drugim.

seg.quote: The case fastened at the top.

sense.def:
To fasten one thing to another
pomeni pritrditi prvo stvar k drugi.

seg.quote: The bench had been fastened to the pavement.

gramGrp.pos:
ERG VB
or
VB,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To fasten one's hands round something
ali
to fasten one's hands onto something
pomeni nekaj trdno prijeti.

seg.quote: He fastened his hands round the spear.
Her hands fastened on the climbing rope.

sense.def:
To fasten on to someone or something
pomeni osredotočiti svojo pozornost ali napor na nekoga ali nekaj.

seg.quote: Once she had fastened on to a scheme she did not let go.
